alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Carter; Greenup; Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 3:38AM EST until January 07 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Ohio, southwest Virginia, northeast Kentucky and most of central and southwestern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very difficult to impossible travel conditions. Slick roads and road closures occurring. Hazardous conditions will impact commutes through the morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills this morning are likely to drop into the single digits at lower elevations, and into the single digits below zero at higher elevations.
info.instruction: Avoid travel. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
